item.title: “Resume”
item.description: 中文版 Contact Details Name: Dong Wang, Email: wd@wdicc.com Blog: https://wdicc.com/ , GitHub: https://github.com/wd Brief Introduction Over a decade of experience in project development and management, with a broad range of technical knowledge, including expertise in building big data platforms, developing advertising systems, database maintenance, and e-commerce system development.

item.title: “Resume”
item.description: English version 联系方式 邮箱: wd@wdicc.com blog: https://wdicc.com/ ， github: https://github.com/wd 学历 北京航空航天大学 2002 年本科毕业，应用物理与应用电子技术专业。 个人介绍
